posts.post_content:
A large find new to the hobby in 2008 was garnered by Beckett for grading.
Andy Broome may have touched these cards in 2008.
Cert #s all began with 544xxxx.
All cards were sold initially through REA.  If this provenance appeals to you, I have other cards from this find including Cobb Bat On

For sale are ten cards from the find all graded 4.5 and all with Sweet Cap NY backs (both 150 and 350).  Therefore they are a uniform set of cards for a midrange upgrader.  Sold individually or in bunches.  Add $3.00/card for regular PP.  No FF for this sale.  Check or MO okay.  I'll cover shipping for multiple card orders, otherwise add $5.00 as well.  Have at it.  Representatives are waiting for your PMs.

Red Ames Portrait  $OLD   
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10016/ames-portrait[/IMG]

Shad Barry   $OLD
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10018/barry-s[/IMG]

Lena (The Mud Man) Blackburne   $OLD  
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10050/blackburne[/IMG]

Bill Dineen    $OLD
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10095/dineen[/IMG]

Bill Donovan Throwing   $OLD  
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10096/donovan-pitching[/IMG]

Red Dooin    $OLD  
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10083/dooin[/IMG]

Patsy Dougherty   $OLD   
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10085/dougherty-portrait[/IMG]

Ted Easterly   $OLD
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10088/easterly[/IMG]

Charlie Hemphill   $OLD.  
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10111/hemphill[/IMG]

James Jackson   $OLD
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10120/jackson[/IMG]


In the current market prices are good for a month from the original listing or until March 18.
They may be raised then.  They will not be lowered.

I WILL TAKE BOTH ...SOLD

Thank you, if so

Dan KOteles
Prices please on cards requested in  PM
